document_data.mainbody:
A Tour of Tempest was an Umberlant book that discussed the divine tempest domain, written by and published sometime in or before the late 15 century DR.
Dusks Dark Desires was a series of intrigue and lewd romance chapbooks. One of the later novels in the series was noticeably more smutty than its prequels with the blood and sex being, arguably the books best parts. Some also praised the books fine intrigue and character work of Bedford, a beautifully-written werecow, as well as Dusk, the novels protagonist.
In the , the Book Brigade, a book club in the city of Baldurs Gate, met to discuss several books in the series.
